definition: (of sth that has been deformed) to spring back to original shape/(fig.) to rebound/to bounce back
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)

sentences.english: Design is brief with flexibility, and it is dressed comfortably.
sentences.chinese: 简洁的设计，回弹力好，随体舒适。

sentences.english: This was swiftly done. The company rebounded well.
sentences.chinese: 快速进行了重组之后，公司又良好地回弹。

sentences.english: A rebound in trade with China may be the best birthday present he gets.
sentences.chinese: 与中国贸易回弹可能是他能得到的最好的生日礼物。

sentences.english: Dyeing time would not affect both the drawing recovery and the bending recovery of PTT filament.
sentences.chinese: 但染色时间对拉伸和弯曲回弹率基本没有景响。

sentences.english: This leads to cords of attachment rebounding into the fields of those remaining behind.
sentences.chinese: 这导致连结的绳索回弹入那些活着的人的能量场。

sentences.english: To control loading and unloading path is a good way to decrease spring-back.
sentences.chinese: 论述了加载和卸载路径对弯曲回弹的影响机理。

sentences.english: Enhance the crease recovery and rebound properties of the wool fabric.
sentences.chinese: 可提高羊毛织物的褶皱恢复性能和回弹性能。

sentences.english: For slower rebound, turn the red adjuster knob clockwise.
sentences.chinese: 顺时针转动红色调节钮以减慢回弹速度。

sentences.english: At the same time, the spring back allowance of bottoming bending of circle section rod is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 同时对圆棒料的弯曲回弹进行了理论分析。

sentences.english: The copolyester is an excellent elasticity and tensile properties.
sentences.chinese: 该共聚酯有极好的拉伸性能和回弹性。

sentences.english: But when discharging voltage increases further to 400V, the grain size rebounds slightly.
sentences.chinese: 当放电电压达到400V时，晶粒尺寸略有回弹。

sentences.english: Designed for high temperature requirements rebound parts of manholes, valves.
sentences.chinese: 适应于高温要求回弹部位的人孔，阀门。

sentences.english: Springback is a common physical phenomenon in the metal sheet forming.
sentences.chinese: 回弹现象是冷冲压成型过程中不可避免的物理现象。

sentences.english: When an object caroms off a curve, the angle of impact is equal to the angle of rebound.
sentences.chinese: 当一个物体反弹离开曲线时，撞击角等于回弹角。

sentences.english: For faster rebound, turn the red adjuster knob counterclockwise.
sentences.chinese: 顺时针转动红色调节钮以减慢回弹速度。

definition: buffer/to cushion/to adjust to sharp changes
